recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Beat eggs and pecorino Romano cheese together.
Add cooked spaghetti to the egg mixture and toss.
Add guanciale and black pepper to taste.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken breast in yogurt and spices.
Cook marinated chicken in a pan.
Add tomato sauce and heavy cream to the pan.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter, sugar, and brown sugar together.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Combine dry ingredients and add to wet ingredients.
Drop dough onto a baking sheet and bake.
